short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shower the screen with your emojis of choice!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's raining emoji!!

Have a shower of emojis on your screen whenever you visit your url of choice! 

Navigate to your desired URL and use the option menu to choose what emojis you want to blast! 

Have fun on your own browser or surprise someone else!
